text:
The festival of festivals held on the
surface of the moon, the Galaxy Carnival Expo.
An attack occurred in the midst of it.

Thanks to [Player] and the heroes' efforts,
the incident was resolved,
and several days have passed since then.

The event has regained its composure,
and is about to reach its grand
finale with great success.

Walking through the stalls of the bustling Japan Pavilion,
which has succeeded in attracting customers,
[Player] mutters to themselves.

options.text: I can't believe it's gotten this lively...
It has gotten so different from the first day.
I'm glad we've all worked hard.

text:
While enjoying the laughter from the people around
and the aroma wafting from the food stalls,
[Player] hears a voice calling out to them.

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, [Player]!
Good work out there.
What, are you all alone?

name: Roudin
text:
I was also just wandering around.
If you don't have any plans,
why don't we take a walk together?

options.text: Of course, I'd love to!
We haven't had much time for just the two of us.
It's a little date, isn't it!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you say the nicest things.
Well then, I suppose I will have to escort you to your heart's content.

name: Roudin
text:
Hehe, well then, my dear customer.
Please take my hand, for I,
Roudin, will be your guide.

With a smile, Roudin gently takes
[Player]'s hand as they start walking.

name: Roudin
text:
Might be a bit late for this, but it's been
quite the success. It may sound like I'm
bragging, but we really did a great job.

The many people coming and going on the street,
the clamor and laughter surrounding them.

With his eyes narrowing at the scene,
Roudin smiles with satisfaction.

name: Roudin
text:
Alright, first, let's get something to eat.
Well then... Let's just buy
each other whatever we like.

options.text: Sounds good, I'm starving.
What should I eat...
How about some super spicy takoyaki?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, not that story again!?
Give me a break...
Just thinking about it makes my tongue tingle.

text:
At the savory smell wafting from the
lined-up stalls and the cheerful calls of
the vendors, they buy one after another.

note:
大人買い (otonagai / adult-like): slang used to describe bulk buying
term got expanded over time to include most collectible things, but it used to be on children's products

options.text: Wow, I bought a lot!
Buying like an adult was fun...!
Ahaha, I wonder if I can eat all this...

name: Roudin
text:
Well, we do have plenty of time.
If we take our time,
we can probably finish it all.

name: Roudin
text:
Now then.
All that's left is to find a place to settle down...
Wait, everywhere's already packed.

In front of the two holding food in both hands,
the festival's dining space was overflowing with people,
and all the tables were full.

name: Roudin
text:
What do we do...
We could just wait, but...
Oh, I know a good place!

name: Roudin
text:
Hehe, I'll invite you to a special spot.
Don't tell the others of it, okay?

Led by the smiling Roudin,
the two of them leave Japan Pavilion
and head to a certain place.

By the time the sky projected above
changes from blue to red,
the place they arrived at was—

name: Roudin
text:
Here we are.
Behind this stage, there's
a little resting area.

name: Roudin
text:
Staff are allowed to use it
as they please― Oh.
Nobody's here, guess we're in luck.

They settle down at a table set up
in the area shaded by the stage,
and the two of them spread out their food.

name: Roudin
text:
Well then, let's dig in!
I'm hooked on the meat skewers here,
so I was really looking forward to this.

The two of them continue to enjoy
their meal, and when a moment of
silence falls, Roudin lets a word slip.

name: Roudin
text:
...It's quiet.
It's like that huge stage
was never even here.

name: Roudin
text:
The end of a stage, no matter how many times
I've experienced it, I've never gotten used to it.
...I can't help but think.

name: Roudin
text:
Have I done a good job,
have I brought smiles to the spectators...
Have I given them something to remember?

options.text: I'm sure you have.
I don't know about everyone else, but...
At least, you've given them to me.

name: Roudin
text:
Haha, thanks!
I've been doing this since I was a kid,
so I'd like to be aware of it by now.

options.text: Your childhood...
What were you like as a child?
I heard you were a genius child magician.

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, are we talking about that now?
The genius magician, Robert Burton!
Hehe, don't you know I was famous back then?

name: Roudin
text:
...Back then, it was just fun.
I loved magic, and as long as I was
having fun, that's all that mattered.

name: Roudin
text:
Then, I decided to make my professional debut.
That's when I decided to
go by the name Roudin.

name: Roudin
text:
Not a magician for myself,
but a magician for the
smiles of the world!

With a smile on his face,
Roudin talks about his past.
His face gradually darkens.

name: Roudin
text:
Well, you already know how it turned out.
Without anyone in the world knowing,
I was just about to disappear.

name: Roudin
text:
You're the one who made this
Roudin a magician again, so I'm
really grateful to you, you know?

options.text: You're the one who didn't give up.
Oh, in private...
Do I call you Robert-san?

name: Roudin
text:
Please call me Roudin as usual.
...Through the highs and lows,
this is the name that's been with me.

name: Roudin
text:
...But, well, you have a point.
Maybe it's not so bad to be called
by my real name sometimes.

name: Roudin
text:
The one who knows everything about me
is laughing somewhere in the universe.
That alone makes me want to do my best.

Roudin suddenly embraces [Player]
and whispers into their ear.
No one could have seen his expression.

name: Roudin
text:
Now, then!
It's almost time for the Grand Finale.
We should get going before people come... Ah.

name: Roudin
text:
Right, [Player]!
Just this one last time, can you
transform me into that form?

name: Roudin
text:
You didn't get to see the stage
while you were battling, right?
So, I'll show you something good instead!

options.text: Yay, I'm really looking forward to it!
Actually, I was a little disappointed.
Alright, let's have you transformed!

name: Roudin
text:
Thanks, [Player].
Just for your eyes, I'll show you
your very own special stage!

Dressed in a splendid stage
costume, Roudin slowly ascends
to the empty stage.

And, he looks at [Player],
with the crimson sky at his back,
and smiles brightly.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Welcome, [Player]-sama.
What will transpire tonight is
this Roudin's special stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Not for anyone else in the world,
but a stage for just one person,
from a man who wants to see your smile.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
There is only one thing I'd like to ask of you.
Until the very end, please enjoy yourself!

With a huge smile and a bow, the stage
for just one person begins.

Every time Roudin waves his hand,
every time he shoots an arrow,
a mystical light fills the stage.

options.text: Amazing... I can't take my eyes off him.
I feel so fancy...
You're smiling, Roudin-san!

text:
The fantastic stage that steals
your gaze and leaves you forget to
blink, soon reaches its climax—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Now, here comes the climax!
I'll show you, that even if
I can't change the world—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Just for you, I'll at least
try to repaint the sky!

He draws his bow, and the released arrow
becomes fireworks, repainting the sky above.

With the colorful lights at his back,
Roudin takes a bow, and ends his special
stage with a huge smile on his face.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Thank you very much for watching
this one-night-only special stage!
...Just kidding.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Now then, let us get going.
It's almost time for the Grand
Finale, so people will be...

As Roudin tries to get off the stage,
at that moment, from outside the stage,
a loud cheer reaches the ears of the two.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...Damn.
I guess I got a little too carried away.
Ah... [Player].

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I could just blend into the Grand Finale like this...
But, I'd rather to be with you a little longer.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I want to engrave it in your
memory, this festival, this stage...
And... this guy named me.

While blushing crimson like
the sky, Roudin takes [Player]'s
hand and starts walking.

As the sky turns dark,
the two figures disappear into
the clamor of the festival.
